name: My Super Me: And The Tower Timeloop
name_original: My Super Me: And The Tower Timeloop
description:
My Super Me: And the Tower Timeloop
Episode 1

Be a Flash like superhero that needs to save hostages from a huge building that is stuck in a Timeloop.
The main villain is at the top floor and its up to you to stop his masterplan.
Are you going to save the day!

(this game is my entree for the VImjam 2020)
Theme: There  & Back
Focus: Collectables
It was made in 7 days and i streamed the whole process on my twitch page.
Come find me if you want to hang out in my dev streams.
I am wormjuice, and i hope you like my games.
https://www.twitch.tv/wormjuicedev

Controls

Gamepad
Left analog stick to move
A Start game & jump
X Punch
Y Kick

Keyboard
(control bug will be fixed once i can upload a new udate, for the time being best to use gamepad, that one works great.)
A Left
D Right
Space Jump
Left Arrow Punch
Right Arrow Kick

Left shoulder button Release Bullets.
